```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(countup)
```

<main>
<div class = "container">

```{r demo}
opts = list(
  useEasing = TRUE, 
  useGrouping = TRUE, 
  separator = "'", 
  decimal = '.',
  prefix = "~"
)
div(class = "page-header",
    h3(HTML("John has been on earth for <span class = 'red-text'>"), 
       countup(29 * 365 * 24 * 60, options = opts), HTML("</span> minutes.")))
```

```{r install}
h3("Install")
```

```{r install code, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/countup")
```

```{r examples}
h3("Examples")
```

```{r example code, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(countup)

countup(25) # basic examples

opts = list(
  useEasing = TRUE, 
  useGrouping = TRUE, 
  separator = ',', 
  decimal = '.', 
  prefix = 'US$', 
  suffix = ' bejillion' 
)

countup(count = 1729, start = 10, options = opts) # with options
```
